import React, { useState } from "react"; const Profile = () => { const [isPopupOpen, setIsPopupOpen] = useState(false); const user = { name: "John Doe", email: "johndoe@example.com", role: "Administrator", joined: "January 15, 2024", profilePic: "https://via.placeholder.com/150" }; return (

{user.name}

{user.email}

Role: {user.role}

Joined: {user.joined}

{isPopupOpen && (

Edit Profile

)}
); }; export default Profile;
